data.comment: The match is underway at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Free kick Arsenal.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Tottenham.
Tottenham's Eric Dier gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Arsenal at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Tottenham.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tottenham needs to be cautious. Arsenal have an attacking throw-in.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 6, Bukayo Saka for Arsenal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
Martin Atkinson awards Tottenham a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Tottenham.
Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tottenham's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 10, Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal in London.
In London Arsenal attack through Thomas Partey. The finish is off target, however.
Tottenham have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Heung Min Son.
In the minute 13, Harry Kane instrumental with a fine assist.
Arsenal are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 18, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a Tottenham throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 21, Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Pierre Hojbjerg gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tottenham.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Tottenham.
Harry Kane (Tottenham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Arsenal close to the penalty box.
Tottenham’s Pierre Hojbjerg is on his feet again at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Martin Atkinson waits before resuming play because Pierre Hojbjerg for Tottenham is still down.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Arsenal.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Tottenham.
In the minute 39, Important block from the Tottenham defence as Thomas Partey fires in a strike for Arsenal.
Martin Atkinson signals a Arsenal throw-in in Tottenham's half.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tottenham's Giovani Lo Celso has been booked in London.
In the minute 43, Free kick in a good position for Arsenal!
Arsenal's Alexandre Lacazette gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tottenham defender.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in London.
Goal! Tottenham extend their lead to 2-0 through Harry Kane.
In the minute 45, Great play from Heung Min Son to set up the goal.
Dani Ceballos is replacing Thomas Partey for Arsenal at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Arsenal.
Arsenal push forward at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium and Alexandre Lacazette gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Tottenham defence.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Tottenham.
Arsenal surge into the attack at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium but Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang’s header is off-target.
In the minute 49, Tottenham have a goal kick.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Arsenal.
In the minute 54, Free kick Arsenal.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Tottenham.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 58, Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Arsenal have a dangerous throw-in.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 61, Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
Arsenal's Willian breaks free at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Arsenal close to the penalty box.
In the minute 67, Martin Atkinson awards Tottenham a goal kick.
Arsenal's Alexandre Lacazette goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
In the minute 69, Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a Tottenham throw-in in Arsenal's half.
In the minute 71, The match at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Bukayo Saka, who is down injured.
The home team have replaced Giovani Lo Celso with Ben Davies. This is the first substitution made today by Jose Mourinho.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 74, Bukayo Saka returns to the field for Arsenal after picking up a slight injury.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 75, Granit Xhaka (Arsenal) has received a first yellow card.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Arsenal.
Mikel Arteta is making the team's second substitution at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium with Edward Nketiah replacing Hector Bellerin.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for Arsenal, close to Tottenham's area.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
In the minute 79, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Free kick Arsenal.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Tottenham.
In the minute 80, Alexandre Lacazette for Arsenal has been booked by Martin Atkinson and receives a first yellow card.
Tottenham are pushing forward but Harry Kane's finish is wide of the goal.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Bukayo Saka (Arsenal) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Arsenal's Alexandre Lacazette misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Tottenham make their second substitution with Lucas Moura replacing Heung Min Son.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Martin Atkinson blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
Joe Rodon is on a sub for Steven Bergwijn for Tottenham.
